name: War Management
description:
This is a 2D battle game about small cubes fighting each other. This will be getting many major updates if the game is liked. In this game you control both sides as a battle simulator of sorts. 

Controls

Q-Basic Fighter
W- Shield Fighter
E- Basic Archer
R- Basic Cavelry
T- Wizard
Z- Change Teams
X- Clear Red
C- Clear Blue
